user_stories.title: Create Chatbot for Customer Support
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to interact with a chatbot so that I can get quick answers to my questions and resolve issues efficiently
acceptance_criteria: Chatbot can understand and respond to common customer inquiries about products, services, and account information
Chatbot can provide accurate and up-to-date information to customers
Chatbot can seamlessly transfer customers to a live agent if needed
Chatbot has a friendly and conversational tone that provides a positive user experience
Chatbot can handle multiple concurrent conversations without performance degradation
Chatbot can be easily integrated into the company's website and mobile app

user_stories.title: Create Sales Chatbot
user_stories.description: As a sales representative, I want a chatbot that can engage with customers so that I can provide better sales support and increase conversions.
acceptance_criteria: Chatbot can greet customers and ask qualifying questions to understand their needs
Chatbot can provide relevant product information and recommendations based on customer responses
Chatbot can schedule a call or meeting with a sales representative if the customer is interested in making a purchase
Chatbot can handle common sales-related inquiries and provide accurate, up-to-date information
Chatbot can seamlessly transfer the conversation to a live sales representative if the customer requests to speak with a human
Chatbot can track and report on key metrics such as number of conversations, conversion rate, and customer satisfaction

story_templates.default: As a {user_type}, I want {functionality} so that {benefit}
story_templates.system: As a system, I need {functionality} so that {benefit}
story_templates.stakeholder: As a {stakeholder_type}, I want {functionality} so that {business_value}
